text: 2.12 Lom 6.19, Epe 1.4, Kol 1.22, 1 Te 4.7, 1 Jo 2.16 Chɨn God nop kud ñɨl, ne anɨgup tek kɨdek ma gep ak sek, tap lum awl dun agɨl gos nɨgep ak sek, pɨsnep kelɨgɨnɨgun. Chɨn pen takaw sayn tep agɨl, gos nɨgtep gɨl gɨnɨgun. Teplep mɨdɨl mɨdtep gɨl, God anɨgup tek gun agɨl gos nɨŋɨd gɨnɨgun. Binɨb lum awl nab okok mɨdobun ak pen, God yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gep ne ak nɨŋɨd, chɨnop takaw tep anɨb ak agñek, gos ne ak kɨdek gɨnɨgabun.
